description: Increase the number of node groups in the Global datastore.

parameters.name: GlobalReplicationGroupId
parameters.description: The name of the Global datastore.

parameters.name: NodeGroupCount
parameters.description: Total number of node groups you want.

parameters.name: RegionalConfigurations
parameters.description: Describes the replication group IDs, the Amazon regions where they are stored and the shard configuration for each that comprise the Global datastore (dict) --- A list of the replication groups The name of the secondary cluster The Amazon region where the cluster is stored A list of PreferredAvailabilityZones objects that specifies the configuration of a node group in the resharded cluster. (dict) --- A list of PreferredAvailabilityZones objects that specifies the configuration of a node group in the resharded cluster. NodeGroupId (string) --- Either the ElastiCache supplied 4-digit id or a user supplied id for the node group these configuration values apply to. PreferredAvailabilityZones (list) --- A list of preferred availability zones for the nodes in this cluster. (string) ---

nested_params.name: ReplicationGroupId
nested_params.description: The name of the secondary cluster.

nested_params.name: ReplicationGroupRegion
nested_params.description: The Amazon region where the cluster is stored.

nested_params.name: ReshardingConfiguration
nested_params.description: A list of PreferredAvailabilityZones objects that specifies the configuration of a node group in the resharded cluster.

nested_params.name: NodeGroupId
nested_params.description: Either the ElastiCache supplied 4-digit id or a user supplied id for the node group these configuration values apply to.

nested_params.name: PreferredAvailabilityZones
nested_params.description: A list of preferred availability zones for the nodes in this cluster.

parameters.name: ApplyImmediately
parameters.description: Indicates that the process begins immediately. At present, the only permitted value for this parameter is true.

nested_items.name: GlobalReplicationGroup
nested_items.description: Consists of a primary cluster that accepts writes and an associated secondary cluster that resides in a different Amazon region. The secondary cluster accepts only reads. The primary cluster automatically replicates updates to the secondary cluster.
